snippet: A damaged subway tunnel between Manhattan and Brooklyn will be closed for work expected to last until October 2014 and to cost over $300 million.
abstract: Montague tube under the East River, connecting Brooklyn and Manhattan is one of nine subway tunnels that were severely damaged by flooding during Hurricane Sandy; extensive repair work that is about to begin will force many R train riders to adjust their commutes for more than a year.
lead_paragraph: A damaged subway tunnel between Manhattan and Brooklyn will be closed for work expected to last until October 2014 and to cost over $300 million.

headline.main: Repairs to a Storm-Damaged Tunnel Will Disrupt R Line Service for a Year
headline.print_headline: Repairs to a Storm-Damaged Tunnel Will Disrupt R Line Service for a Year
